code: import{constants}from'../../constants';export default(function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case constants.SET_TOTAL_RECORD:return action.payload;case constants.UPDATE_TOTAL_RECORD_AFTER_DELETE:return state-action.payload;case constants.UPDATE_TOTAL_RECORD_AFTER_ADD:return state+action.payload;default:return state;}});
